utils.recaptcha_notice: This site is protected by reCAPTCHA and the Google :privacy_policy and :terms_of_service apply.

home.title: Home
home.meta_description: Explore the beauty of Nusantara tourism with our comprehensive guide. Discover the best travel destinations, enjoy AR experiences at tourist spots, and calculate your travel carbon footprint. Enjoy a responsible and unforgettable vacation in Indonesia.
home.jumbotron_description: Discover the best travel destinations, enjoy AR experiences at tourist spots, and calculate your travel carbon footprint. Enjoy a responsible and unforgettable vacation in Indonesia.
home.culture_tour_jumbotron_description: Explore the unique traditions and customs across different regions of Indonesia. Discover the enchanting charm of its cultural heritage.

login.title: Login Page
login.meta_description: Log in to your account on Nusantara Travel Guide to access exclusive features and your personal travel plans. Explore the beauty of Nusantara with us!
login.login_description: Log in below to access your account

register.title: Register Page
register.meta_description: Register now on the Nusantara travel guide website to get the latest information on the best tourist destinations in Indonesia, travel tips, and exclusive offers. Join our community of travelers and discover the beauty of Nusantara.
register.register_description: Please register by filling out the form below

email_confirmation.title: Email Confirmation
email_confirmation.content_description: We have sent an email to :email. Please check your inbox and click on the verification link.
email_confirmation.waiting_message: Please wait :time s before resending the email.

404.title: Page not found
404.content_description: Sorry, we can't find that page. You'll find lots to explore on the home page.

reset_password.title: Password Reset Page
reset_password.content_description: Fill in the following reset form to reset your password
reset_password.email_sended: We have sent a password reset email to :email. Please check your inbox and click the link.

new_password.title: New Password Page
new_password.content_description: Fill up the form to change password
